resources.string:
\ Welcome to MyABC application. In MyABC you will learn letters of the alphabet (A through Z).
 - A for apple
 - B for baseball
 - C for clock
 - D for donkey
 - E for elephant
 - F for father
 - G for grandmother
 - H for hungry
 - I for Internet
 - J for justice
 - K for kangaroo
 - L for London
 - M for monkey
 - N for Norway
 - O for overtime
 - P for pillow
 - Q for question
 - R for rabbit
 - S for superman
 - T for telephone
 - U for underwear
 - V for vaccinate
 - W for World Wide Web
 - X for xylophone
 - Y for yogurt
 - Z for zebra
